subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United, the defending champion, increased its lead in the English Premier League to 5 points, and Chelsea emerged as the main rival in this season’s title chase. United beat Liverpool, 3-0, to improve to 73 points, and Chelsea took over second place with 68 points by rallying to beat Arsenal, 2-1.
